
## Usage

Add the theme to your book's configuration `book.json` or `book.js`:

```js
{
    "plugins": [
        "theme-bookstyle"
    ],
    "variables": {
        "themeFexa":{
            "nav":[
                {
                    "url":"http://...",
                    "target":"_blank",
                    "name": "test"
                }
            ]
        },
    },
    "pluginsConfig": {
        "theme-bookstyle":{
            "search-placeholder":"输入关键字搜索", 
            "logo":"./logo.png",
            "favicon": "./favicon.ico"
        }
    }
},
```

Install by command:

``` bash
gitbook install
```

## Recommand plugins

```js
plugins: [
    '-sharing',
    "-fontsettings",
    'back-to-top-button',
    "copy-code-button",
    "cuav-chapters",
    "heading-anchors",
    "theme-bookstyle"
    //...
]
```
